Posts.Content: yes! men can get breast cancer too although very uncommon compared to women.
Posts.Title: Breast Lumps

Posts.Content: i've also had a very itchy nipples sometimes but mine doens't last for a week, 1 or 2 days the most. i would assume you have check your breast for any lumps. if there is no changes on the nipples or any discharge then its probably nothing to worry about. its also possible that you are allergic to some laundry detergent or fabric softener.
Posts.Title: itchy nipple
